name: Hog Hunter 4(Back for the Bounty
description:
It's a simple side scrolling shoot em up with a cute little story. There's no life or death system and you don't even need to shoot to progress. After spending 30 hours on this and getting SOOOOO close to having it finished I'm very sad to see it falling apart like it is. I guess that's what happens when you try to shove a game together with no sleep huh? All art and code was made by me by hand in the for the express purpose of submitting it to this game jam.

I am the only developer

Eric Black

Email rockpapertrade@gmail.com
